subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chris Osgood made 25 saves to earn his 14th career postseason shutout and Detroit took a 2-0 lead over Columbus in their first-round Western Conference series.
snippet: Chris Osgood made 25 saves to earn his 14th career postseason shutout and Detroit took a 2-0 lead over Columbus in their first-round Western Conference series.
